page.title: 08INDUSTRY:THE TOURIST TRADE
page.content: (cont.from P.7) Park (A):200 caravans for hire,space for 40 tourers;Club House;restaurant; cafeteria/take away;shop;launderette; playground;swimming pool;games room; toilet blocks with showers;38 flats and 7 suites. Park (B):104 caravans for hire,space for 120 tourers or tents;shop with off -licence;toilet block with showers. ____________________ Tourists like our area mostly for its natural attractions such as beaches, countryside and quaint harbours.There are also amusements such as arcades, crazy golf,speed boat rides,self hire boats,fishing trips and coastal trips.
